name: Undermine Defense
description:
Fight with hordes of enemies in procedural maps while mining for resources. Features
  • Procedural maps
  • Online leaderboard
  • Cool particle fx!
  • Not so cool sound fx! ( But at least there is one)
  • 4 different enemy types
  • 3 different turrets with upgrades
Criteria I used:
  1.  Strategy (Used)
  2. Tower Defense (Used)
  3. Short-term Memory (Didn't had enough time)
  4. Energy Drink (Used but as a energy giving turret called "Dispenser turret")
  5. Playability (Used)
Web version will come out once the jam is over This game and all of it's assets are made in 96 hours for #JamDna 3. @Wolderado

I had so much fun making it. I hope the game can grow beyond this prototype state
